content.html: It's Content Day at @incident_io! Everyone downs tools for a day, and writes blog posts that we can use for the following month. We write about everything from incident response, to how we build the product, to how we run projects. It's very therapeutic. ‚úçÔ∏è
content.value:
It's Content Day at @incident_io! 

Everyone downs tools for a day, and writes blog posts that we can use for the following month. We write about everything from incident response, to how we build the product, to how we run projects. 

It's very therapeutic. ‚úçÔ∏è
